# Publishing {#r-publishing}

## Questions {#r-publishing-questions}

```{r, child="questions/r-publishing.md"}
```

Rough outline of process:

* Knit to HTML in `docs/` folder
* Put on github, setup as website
* Visit at `xxx.github.io/project_name`

Other topics to cover:
* Linking to static images
* Linking to other files
* Organization of files
* Privacy (e.g. from https://help.github.com/en/articles/what-is-github-pages "GitHub Pages sites are publicly available on the internet, even if their repositories are private.")
